meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>tribe</kanji> that <kanji>runs wild</kanji> (暴走) is what the Japanese call a <vocabulary>biker gang</vocabulary>. Just imagine them riding around on their bikes, running wild. They're also close, like a family. How nice!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
